page.title: 15CLUBS ORGANISATIONS 2
page.content: {COWLING OLD PEOPLES WELFARE {ASSOCIATION A committee of local people help older villagers to live a full life in the community by organising all sorts of activities,including trips out of the village.There is usually a concert for them at Christmas,with a tea afterwards. {COWLING NEWSLETTER Each month a Newsletter is published and distributed to all the houses in the village.It gives information about forthcoming events,and presents reports on various organisations.It is produced by local people,and often contains competitions, a crossword,and letters as well as news items. {ALLOTMENTS There are about 25 allotments where the holders grow vegetables and keep hens.The rent is Â£5 a month.
